name: ionCube-Loader
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: ionCube Loader handles the reading and execution of ionCube encoded PHP files at run time.

matches.text:
ionCube Loader Wizard

An updated version of this Wizard script is available here.

matches.regexp:
(?-mix:

The ionCube Loader ([^\s]+) is already installed but it is an old version\. It is recommended that the Loader be updated to the latest version)

(?-mix:

The ionCube Loader ([^\s]+) is already installed and encoded files should run without problems.<\/p>)
